alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 19 at 4:09AM EDT until April 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FOR THURSDAY... Unseasonably warm temperatures and a dry air mass is forecast on Thursday, with relative humidity values dipping into the 20 to 25% range. Additionally, breezy southwesterly surface winds of 10 mph to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph will lead to elevated fire danger across the area Thursday afternoon and early evening. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHEAST INDIANA AND NORTHERN KENTUCKY... The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Thursday afternoon through Thursday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Far southeast Indiana and portions of northern Kentucky. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop on Thursday will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Reschedule any planned burning, if possible. Conditions will be favorable for rapid fire growth.
